Class CustomerAddController

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomerAddController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerAddController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
It is used to add customer to database and customer table.

    • countryDropDownOnAction

      void countryDropDownOnAction()
      It is used to pick country and filter division dropdown. The Lambda Expression uses selected customer country and sets the filtered divisions for the countryThis makes the code better by letting the filter to take place at the onAction instead of creating three separate methods in appointmentDB, each filtering for one country, then running each method at the onAction.
